title: great
review: this is tom cruise at his earnest best looks amazing - particularly if you have home projector some may think too cheesy but great social commentary (presumably the remainder of dick's story) and fantastic adrenalin rushtime travel theory understory for those looking for intellectual involvementand also goes to show the danger of looking at crime judgmentally and prejudgmentallya lesson for all perhaps to avoid the slow creep of police states and moral majority persecution
